description: This file implements a React component 'TodoPage' which is the main screen for a to-do list application. It manages state for todos, filtering, and provides handlers for adding, editing, deleting, and toggling completion status of todos. The component renders various subcomponents like AppBar, TodoCard, BottomNav, and Fab, and handles user interactions to update the list of todos.

methods.name: TodoPage()
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the to-do list UI, manages state and handlers for todos.
